attributes.action: Why are we forced to pay National Insurance
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to let the people opt out of paying National Insurance so we can pay for private health care. I have been unable to work for the past year and I can't get any benefit's to help me live.
So why pay into something that we are told will help us, when really after filling out hundreds of forms you are told you are not intitled to any help.
I have no savings I have no income how am I to live??
